item.title: Unjail command help[delta]
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

try this
if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && (playerRights > 2 || hasSpecialRights())) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.resetPos();
		p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been un-jailed by " + playerName);
		sM("You have un-jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to un-jail..");
            }
        }

Read full topic

item.title: Unjail command help[delta]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

CODE:
if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) {
String name = command.substring(7);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
p.toX = 2954;
p.toY = 3931;
p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
p.updateRequired = true;
p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
p.sM(
p.updateRequired = true;
p.appearanceUpdateRequired =true;
}
}

i got an error with the p.updateRequired = true;
p.appearanceUpdateRequired =true;
